title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Video sampling & search using ElastiCache & multimodal embeddings (DAT433)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 ElastiCache 和多模态嵌入进行视频采样与搜索 (DAT433)
abstract: Multimodal embeddings enable a wide range of video analysis capabilities, from content understanding and summarization to classification and recommendations. In this code talk, learn how to use smart sampling and video search, generating multimodal embeddings in Amazon Bedrock and using vector search powered by Amazon ElastiCache. See live coding examples to discover how to build delightful video experiences for your customers.
abstract_cn: 多模态嵌入支持广泛的视频分析能力，从内容理解和摘要到分类和推荐。在本次代码讲座中，学习如何使用智能采样和视频搜索，在 Amazon Bedrock 中生成多模态嵌入，并使用由 Amazon ElastiCache 提供支持的向量搜索。通过实时编码示例，了解如何为您的客户构建出色的视频体验。
